title: Campeonato Carioca Série B1
text: The Campeonato Carioca Série B1 is the <a href="association%20football">football</a> third level of the <a href="Campeonato%20Carioca">First Division</a> annual competition among clubs in the state of <a href="Rio%20de%20Janeiro%20%28state%29">Rio de Janeiro</a>, <a href="Brazil">Brazil</a>. Usually, the champion of the level is promoted in the next season to the Campeonato Carioca. It is under the authority of the <a href="Federa%C3%A7%C3%A3o%20de%20Futebol%20do%20Estado%20do%20Rio%20de%20Janeiro">FERJ or FFERJ</a> (Football Federation of the State of Rio de Janeiro).
